name: Beautifly
description: The Butterfly Pokémon. Beautifly's favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage when attacking a Pokémon of the same type.
